summary: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines is a small island country in the eastern Caribbean Sea. It includes the main island of Saint Vincent and a group of smaller islands called the Grenadines. The country is located near other islands like Saint Lucia, Barbados, and Grenada. With a population of around 110,000 people, it has a British colonial history and is part of several regional organizations. Kingstown is the capital. In 2021, the La Soufri√®re volcano erupted, leading to evacuations and international aid.
title: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
